collection:
This policy describes the types of
information we may collect from you or that you may provide when using our RPG
Game Creator and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting,
and disclosing that information.

## Information We Collect and How We Collect It

We collect information to provide better services to all our users.

The
information we collect includes:

  * The story and details you provide for the creation of your game.
* Personal information such as your name, email address, and first name if you choose to create an account.

Collecting personal information for account creation is optional and based
solely on your consent.

## How We Use Your Information

The information we collect is used exclusively for the purpose of creating and
operating your custom RPG game and managing your account, if you choose to
create one.
We require your email to identify your account.
sharing:
We do not share this information with any third parties, except as
necessary for account management and game operation.
We are committed to ensuring the safe sharing of your data.
